scripts.build:js: browserify app/write-message.js -o build/app/js/write-message.js && browserify app/decode-message.js -o build/app/js/decode-message.js
scripts.build:css: npm run sass && cp app/css/*.css build/app/css/ && cp app/css/icons/* build/app/css/icons
scripts.build:html: npm run build:html:decode && npm run build:html:writer
scripts.cp-vendor: cp vendor/SoundJS/lib/soundjs-0.6.2.min.js build/vendor/SoundJS/lib/ && cp vendor/animate.css/animate.min.css build/vendor/animate.css/ && cp vendor/normalize.css build/vendor/ && cp vendor/modernizr-custom.js build/vendor/  && cp vendor/array-polyfill.js build/vendor/
scripts.cp-all: npm run cp-media && npm run cp-vendor
scripts.build: npm run cp-all && npm run build:html && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
